title.rendered: Admiral Charles Kubic , John Nantz and Mallory Staples to attend Atlanta film premeire of “The Fall of Deceit” 11-13-23

content.rendered:
Fall of Deceit Film Premeire

Veterans for America First aka Veterans for Trump national spokesman Admiral Charles Kubic to headline the film premiere cast Monday, November 13, 2023

Meet and greet cast members and take a photo in front of Danny Hamilton’s Trump Bus which will be on site”

— Stan Fitzgerald VFAF Veterans for Trump grassroots President

ATLANTA , GEORGIA , USA, October 25, 2023 /EINPresswire.com/ — From the press room of L-Strategies : The official press of VFAF Veterans for Trump grassroots national

Rear Admiral Charles Kubic , VFAF national spokesman , to join cast members John Nantz and Mallory Staples , Director Frank X Panico , MC Salleigh Grubbs and producers Stan & Donna Fitzgerald doing meet and greets with the audience and delivering remarks before the film. There will be a question and answer session after the screening.

Guests must register to attend this free event as seating is limited : Register at https://xsintheskyfilms.com/rsvp/

Venue: The Springs Cinema and Tap House 5920 Roswell Rd. Suite C-103. Atlanta, Ga, 30328

“The Fall of Deceit” is a groundbreaking documentary by Frank X. Panico and Stan & Donna Fitzgerald that stars General Flynn with Laura Loomer , Roger Stone , Admiral Charles Kubic , Vernon Jones , Congressman Jody Hice , Jeffrey Clark , John Solomon , John Nantz , Robert Jeffress and Mallory Staples.

To view the trailer visit : https://youtu.be/izeO4JpvzFI

The film is available for streaming now or the DVD can be ordered on Amazon November 15th 2023

Stan Fitzgerald
L-Strategies LLC
+1 770-707-6291
email us here
Visit us on social media:
Facebook
Twitter

THE FALL OF DECEIT Trailer by Frank X Panico and Stan & Donna Fitzgerald with General Flynn , Laura Loomer

You just read:

News Provided By

October 25, 2023, 00:06 GMT
